summary: MVM Suite S5 - UI + Demo Data testing completed. All frontend features working correctly. Vendor Dashboard loads with real API data (total sales, orders, rating, pending payout). Admin Dashboard shows marketplace overview with 15% commission and 7.5% VAT. Vendor selector allows switching between 4 demo Nigerian vendors. All monetary values display in Nigerian Naira (₦). Navigation between vendor dashboard tabs works correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: All MVM components properly use NGN currency symbol (₦) for monetary values
Vendor Dashboard correctly displays: Total Sales, Total Orders, Pending Orders, Avg Rating, Pending Payout, Commission Rate
Admin Dashboard correctly shows: Commission 15%, VAT 7.5%, Active Vendors, Orders (30 days), Revenue, Commission Earned
Vendor selector dropdown works with 4 demo Nigerian vendors: Adebayo Electronics, Mama Nkechi Fashion, Chukwu Home Essentials, Emeka Motors Accessories
All navigation tabs (Dashboard, Orders, Products, Earnings, Profile) are functional
Admin tabs (Overview, Vendors, Commissions, Payouts) work correctly with vendor filtering by status
Recent Orders section displays order statuses (PENDING, SHIPPED, DELIVERED)
Top Products table shows product revenue in NGN
Vendor status badges (APPROVED, PENDING APPROVAL, SUSPENDED) display correctly
Tier badges (Gold Tier) display correctly for vendors
seed_data_creation: Demo data already seeded with Nigerian vendors using seed-mvm-demo.ts script
context_for_next_testing_agent: MVM S5 UI testing complete. All frontend features verified: Vendor Dashboard, Admin Dashboard, vendor selector, NGN currency display, navigation tabs, vendor filtering. Demo marketplace: Lagos Digital Market with 15% commission, 7.5% VAT. Test at /commerce-mvm-demo

vendor_dashboard: ✅ Vendor Dashboard loads with real API data
✅ Welcome header shows vendor name (e.g., 'Welcome back, Adebayo Electronics')
✅ Total Sales metric displays in NGN (₦2,500,000)
✅ Earnings Overview section with Pending Payout (₦2,142,000)
✅ Recent Orders section with status badges (PENDING, SHIPPED, DELIVERED)
✅ Top Products table with revenue in NGN
admin_dashboard: ✅ Vendor Status breakdown (PENDING APPROVAL: 1, APPROVED: 4, SUSPENDED: 1)
✅ Payout Summary with Eligible for Payout (2 vendors)
navigation: ✅ Vendor View / Admin View toggle works
✅ Vendor selector dropdown with 4 demo vendors
✅ Switching vendors loads new vendor data
✅ Admin Vendors tab works with filtering
nigeria_first_requirements: ✅ All monetary values in Nigerian Naira (₦)
